Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ダチョウ
Entry.EnglishText: Ostrich

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: コケコッコー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Cock-a-doodle-doo!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>ねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>, you say?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、あんまり難しい事、 わかんないし……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know anything about that. It sounds complicated.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>聖壇<White>に捧げる<Yellow>命の珠<White>？ 命があって丸いタマって いったら……<Yellow>トリの卵<White>？
Entry.EnglishText: Offering up the <Yellow>Jewel of Life<White> at the <Cyan>Shrine<White>? How about using ...bird eggs?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かしら、ヒューマに対抗する 手段を取る必要はあると思うのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I believe we need to take steps to oppose the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもねぇ、これはねぇ…… 同じガジュマなのに……
Entry.EnglishText: But you know, this is... Even though we Gajuma are the same...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、そんな事を言うと、 大変な事になるし……
Entry.EnglishText: But when you bring it up, it becomes a big deal and...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ……！ あっち行きなさい……!!
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma...! Get out of my sight!

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル様のお宅の方が 騒がしいわね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's been a lot noisier at Chief Doval's house, lately...

Entry.JapaneseText: この頃、しょっちゅう、 どこかで誰かが ケンカしてるのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: These days, there's always some sort of fight going on around here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ケンカ……？ とんでもない！ 私たちは仲良くやってるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: Infighting...? Preposterous! We get along just fine!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマには 関係ない事でしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: It's none of you Huma's business anyways, is it?

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポとレイは、 大人の目を盗んで村を 抜け出したそうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard Topp and Rei snuck out of the village when the adults weren't looking.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらヒューマには、 何も教えたくないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: I refuse to tell you Huma anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポとレイは無事だったのね…… よかった、よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: So Topp and Rei are safe and sound... Thank goodness...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマには この村の事に 口出ししてほしくないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want any Huma meddling in the affairs of our village.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前、トッポとレイが 遊んでいるのを見たわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw Topp and Rei playing together the other day.

Entry.JapaneseText: 手放しで喜ぶこともできないけれど、 悪くはないのかもしれないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: I still have mixed feelings about them playing together, but maybe it's not so bad.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は、生まれてから今日まで この村から出たことがないから よくわからないけれど……
Entry.EnglishText: I have never left this village since the day I was born, so I don't know much about the outside world...

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅を続けるというのは どんな感じなのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what it's like to live a life of traveling?

Entry.JapaneseText: この音……何？
Entry.EnglishText: What is that sound...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔は、ガジュマもヒューマも お互いに種族の違いなんて 気にもしなかったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: In the old days, the Gajuma and Huma never cared about their racial differences.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族って……
Entry.EnglishText: Is race...

Entry.JapaneseText: いえ、何でもないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: No, it's nothing.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒト……
Entry.EnglishText: The Human race...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今まで、この呼び名のことを 真剣に考えたことなんてなかったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've never really considered what it meant before.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、暑さが身にこたえるの。 歳のせいかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: The heat has really been getting to me. Is it just my age?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも生まれ育った街だし、 他の街に移り住むのは ちょっと……
Entry.EnglishText: But I was born and raised here. I don't want to move to another city, This is too much for me...
Entry.Notes: rewrote the last line. want it checked. -dragon.

Entry.JapaneseText: もうすぐ うちのダチョウが 卵を産みそうなの。
Entry.EnglishText: My ostrich is gonna lay her eggs soon.

Entry.JapaneseText: 産んだら 持ってってもいいわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Feel free to take one with you after she lays them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>が生まれるなら、 卵を産むのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: If the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> hatches, I wonder if it'll lay eggs?

Entry.JapaneseText: それよりもうちのダチョウが 卵を産んでくれた方が嬉しいけど。
Entry.EnglishText: But I'd be happier if my ostrich laid her eggs.

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ うちのダチョウが 卵産んでたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? My ostrich laid an egg?

Entry.JapaneseText: やったー！
Entry.EnglishText: Yippee!

Entry.JapaneseText: 卵は持っていって。 別に卵が欲しかったわけじゃないもの。 卵を産んで欲しかっただけだから。
Entry.EnglishText: Go ahead and take the egg. It's not like I wanted it, I just wanted to see her lay an egg.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近ずっと幼なじみのトッポと 遊んでないの。
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't played with Topp, my childhood friend, for a long time.

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんが会っちゃダメって 言うんだけど……どうしてなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Dad says I can't see him. But why?

Entry.JapaneseText: ダチョウの卵のカラは とても固いのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The shell of an ostrich egg is very hard.

Entry.JapaneseText: すっごく高いところから落としても 割れないんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: I hear that it won't break even if you drop it from some place high.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっ、このダチョウ、 卵を産んでるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, this ostrich is laying an egg!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>卵を持っていきますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: Take the egg with you? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: クワッーー!! クワッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Kwaaaah!! Kwah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: クワッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Kwah!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
